survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and preferences regarding the procurement of sustainable office supplies within the organization.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current selection of sustainable office supplies available in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current selection of sustainable office supplies available in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Bamboo or recycled plastic desk organizers
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question; ensure all options are clear and distinct.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Bamboo or recycled plastic desk organizers

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable office supplies would you like to see provided by your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific suggestions. Encourage detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable office supplies would you like to see provided by your workplace?

questions.question_text: How important is it to you that your workplace prioritizes sustainable office supply procurement?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How important is it to you that your workplace prioritizes sustainable office supply procurement?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, do you face in using sustainable office supplies at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify challenges. Encourage honesty and detail.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, do you face in using sustainable office supplies at your workplace?
